text: Psalm 99
Yahweh Is a Holy King
Yahweh is king; let \add the\add* peoples tremble.
\add He\add* sits enthroned\f + \fr 99:1 \ft Or “dwells” \f* \add between the\add* cherubim. Let the earth shake.
Yahweh \add is\add* great in Zion,
and he \add is\add* exalted over all the peoples.
Let them praise your great and fearful name.
He \add is\add* holy.
And \add the\add* strength of \add the\add* king loves justice.\f + \fr 99:4 \ft The interpretation of this line is uncertain \f*
You have established equity;
you have executed justice and righteousness in Jacob.
Exalt Yahweh our God,
and worship at his footstool.
He \add is\add* holy.
Moses and Aaron \add were\add* among his priests;
Samuel also \add was\add* among \add those who\add* called on his name.
They called to Yahweh, and he answered them.
He spoke to them in \add the\add* pillar of cloud.
They kept his testimonies and \add the\add* statute he gave to them.
O Yahweh our God, you answered them.
You were a forgiving God to them,
but an avenger of their \add wrong\add* deeds.
Exalt Yahweh our God,
and worship at his holy mountain,
for Yahweh our God \add is\add* holy.
